ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:40:36 [Issue ID 4000-29604] urn:comicvine:4000-29604 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:58:36. [Issue ID 44472]
ComicInfo.Summary: *Contents* Jack and Damon arrested in Video Jack #3 - Somebody Please Pull The Plug, find themselves in a jail cell of corrupt reality of Mayberry R.F.D.; Kojak is found getting a haircut against his will in Floyd's Barber Shop. The Remote Control is used; the trio are aboard The Nostromo, where they encounter an Alien Queen. Jack and Kojak discover Doreen Taggert turned into Alien food. The Remote Control is stolen from Damon. The trio find themselves in a 1980s sitcom, with laugh track. In this corrupted reality, Mrs. Swift is an alcoholic who never recovered from her husband leaving. Uncle Zach, who stole the Remote Control from Damon on The Nostromo, sends the trio to a new reality with a "clik".
ComicInfo.Tags: Mrs. Swift,Uncle Zach,Kojak,Archie Goodwin,Doreen Taggert,Video Jack,Damon Xarnett
ComicInfo.Title: Family Ties
ComicInfo.Penciller: Keith Giffen,Joe Barney,Stephen DeStefano,Keith Giffen,Joe Barney,Stephen DeStefano
